data.actual_result: The message is simply the username, not including the tag. [e.x. `@Primus` rather than `@Primus#[tag] `]
data.expected_result: User is successfully pinged, with the ping highlighted in blue.
data.short_description: User is not properly pinged when tagged.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a server with a friend/another user. - Click on the username in order to paste it in the text box. - Press enter to submit the ping/message. - The steps above must be done very quickly. Ping the user and immediately send the message as soon as possible.
